IRA Funding Announced for New York

Below is a summary of Inflation Reduction Act funding that has been announced for New York to support clean energy, climate mitigation and resilience, agriculture, and conservation-related investment programs.

  • $340 Million

    Clean Buildings and Homes

  • $195 Million

    Clean Energy

  • $89 Million

    Parks and Conservation

  • $17 Million

    Environmental Remediation

  • $7 Million

    Other

  • $2 Million

    Climate Resilience

  • $2 Million

    Clean Transportation

This data is derived from the White House’s Investing in America website and reflects investments made in New York through the Inflation Reduction Act. Note that this data is intended to be illustrative of federal investments in New York and is not exhaustive; funding for certain programs may not be captured by the White House’s data and therefore is not reflected here. The “Other” category of projects includes certain community development and Tribal projects. Data last updated on December 14th, 2023.
